DocAttribute.Name: Purpose
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifies the logical location of the address.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: Text that relates the nature of the address.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedPurpose
DocAttribute.Documentation: Allows for specification of user specific purpose of the address beyond the enumeration values provided by Purpose attribute of type IfcAddressTypeEnum. When a value is provided for attribute UserDefinedPurpose, in parallel the attribute Purpose shall have enumeration value USERDEFINED.

DocAttribute.Name: OfPerson
DocAttribute.Documentation: The inverse relationship to Person to whom address is associated.

DocAttribute.Name: OfOrganization
DocAttribute.Documentation: The inverse relationship to Organization to whom address is associated.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either attribute value Purpose is not given, or when attribute Purpose has enumeration value USERDEFINED then attribute UserDefinedPurpose shall also have a value.
DocWhereRule.Expression: (NOT(EXISTS(Purpose))) OR ((Purpose <> IfcAddressTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((Purpose = IfcAddressTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS(SELF.UserDefinedPurpose)))
